title: All the Backlist! August 14, 2020
description:
This week, Tirzah talks about two great backlist books, including mysteries that feature unsettling childhood memories.
This episode is sponsored by Read or Dead, Book Riot’s mystery/thriller podcast!
Subscribe to All the Books! using RSS, Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or Stitcher and never miss a beat book.
Sign up for the weekly New Books! newsletter for even more new book news.
This content contains affiliate links. When you buy through these links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Books Discussed on the Show:
The Missing Years by Lexie Elliott
The Last Day of Emily Lindsey by Nic Joseph
